remarks: The one-point compactification of ` NN ` is compact.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
statement:
1stckgen.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
1stckgen.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : NN --> X ) $.
1stckgen.3 $e |- ( ph -> F ( ~~>t ` J ) A ) $.
1stckgenlem $p |- ( ph -> ( J |`t ( ran F u. { A } ) ) e. Comp ) $.
